altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

altTitles.ja: ヒモクズ花くんは死にたがり

altTitles.en: Deadbeat Hana-kun Has a Death Wish

altTitles.zh-hk: 軟飯人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.zh: 软饭人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.vi: Hana-Kun Không Thể Sống Thiếu Tôi

description.en: Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... A love-filled scum boy meets a deeply affectionate company girl, and a love like a powerful drug begins!?
description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)

title.en: The Demon King Who Lost His Job

altTitles.pt-br: O rei demônio que perdeu o emprego

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

description.en: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

altTitles.th: วันธรรมดาของแม่มดว้าวุ่น

altTitles.ja: ふらいんぐうぃっち

description.en:
Kowata Makoto is an airhead with a bad sense of direction who just moved into her relative's house… 
but is that all?  

Note: The Oneshot was originally published under a different pen name (Ishioka Chikai).  


---

title.en: A Story About Getting a Haircut After Hearing Your Crush Prefers Short Hair

altTitles.ja: 好きな人がショートカット好きと知って髪切る話

altTitles.en: Cutting Her Hair After Finding out That the Person She Likes, Likes Short Cuts

altTitles.ja-ro: Suki na Hito ga Short-cut Suki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi
Sukina Hito ga Sho-tokattosuki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: Una historia sobre cortarse el pelo después de oír que su crush prefiere el pelo corto.

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Setelah Tau Kalau Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

altTitles.vi: 割𩯀婁欺別所慼倘伴命啿慼羅𩯀短 (Nom Script)

altTitles.pl: Historia o tym jak obcięłam włosy po tym jak usłyszałam, że ten, kto mi się podoba preferuje krótkie włosy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre cortar o cabelo depois de descobrir que a pessoa que você gosta gosta de cortes curtos

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการตัดผลหหลังจากได้ยินคนที่ชอบพูดว่าชอบสาวผมสั้น

altTitles.uk: Підстриглася після того, як дізналася, що коханий полюбляє короткі стрижки

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Karena Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

title.en: The Next Seat Devil Keeps Depraving Me

description.en: Mia is a half-succubus, but she bitterly hates the devil part of her genetics. "I'm not lewd!", she said. "All men are monkey", she said. Yet, karma often comes sooner than expected.

altTitles.en: A Story about Confessing to an Elf

altTitles.ja: 近所のエルフお姉ちゃんに告白した

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinjo no Elf Onee-chan ni Kokuhaku shita

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Elf Girl Next Door

altTitles.ja: 陰キャエルフちゃんに告った

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Gloomy Elf

altTitles.vi: Tỏ tình với chị gái elf
Tỏ tình với cô elf u ám

altTitles.ja: 大空魔王

description.en: Dr. Hanamaru travels to Egypt looking to uncover the secret of a cabal hidden in the pyramids. The leader is King Rocket, a man with the body of a machine.

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

title.en: Life in Captivity with a Yandere Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ彼女との監禁生活
失敗作の使い魔と魔術師の話

altTitles.en: A Failure of a Familiar and a Mage

description.en: A mage adopts an abandoned familiar. After 80 years of raising her and trying to teach her magic and emotion, he passes away, and she embarks on a journey to help other abandoned familiars and tour the spots that remind mer of her late master.
description.pt-br: Um Oneshot sobre o relacionamento de um mago e uma familiar abandonada, o que esperar dessa história?!

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

title.en: The Yankee Shimizu-san Sitting Next to Me Has Dyed Her Hair Black

altTitles.ja: 隣の席のヤンキー清水さんが髪を黒く染めてきた

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami Okuroku Sometekita

description.en:
***I dyed my hair black for you..... so notice me.***

"Shimizu-san, you dyed your hair black."
"Ah, yeah." "Why did you dye it all of a sudden?"
"Because…yesterday…"

Shimizu-san, the highschool girl yankee who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo…

---

- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)
description.ja:
お前のために髪を黒く染めたんだから……、気づけよな。

「髪染めたんだね」
「ああ」「どうして髪染めたの?」
「お前なんでって……、昨日お前が……」
僕の隣の席に座る金髪から黒髪に染めたヤンキーJK・清水さんは声が少しずつ小さくなり、少し顔を赤らめて机に顔を伏せた。
その後も僕、本堂大輝が友人との恋バナで「女子と一緒に料理したい」と話すと、翌日、いつも授業をサボる清水さんと一緒に料理することになったり、「女子の手料理食べてみたい」と話すと、なぜか二つあるお弁当を分けてくれたり……。
学校で一番怖いヤンキー、実は恋愛に不器用で乙女な清水さんとの青春ラブコメ。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330654424803992)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://sneakerbunko.jp/series/yanmizusan)
description.pt-br:
Eu pintei meu cabelo de preto para você... então me note.

"Shimizu-san, você pintou seu cabelo de preto."
"Ah, sim." "Por que você o pintou de repente?"
"Porque... ontem..."

Shimizu-san, a colegial ianque que se senta ao lado de Hondo, com seu cabelo recém-tingido, gradualmente abaixou sua voz, corou levemente e deitou seu rosto na mesa. Depois disso, quando Daiki Hondo falou com seu amigo sobre como ele queria estar com uma garota que sabia cozinhar, no dia seguinte Hondo acabou fazendo dupla com Shimizu-san na aula de culinária, embora ela sempre matasse aula. Quando Hondo mencionou que gostaria de experimentar a culinária artesanal de uma garota, por algum motivo ela trouxe dois bentos para o almoço no dia seguinte e dividiu um com Hondo...

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun! Gender makes little difference in the face of such cuteness in this heart-stoppingly sweet comedy!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amou, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amou sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?

title.en: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

altTitles.en: Max-Level Green Tea Transmigrates Into Little Pitiful One

altTitles.zh-ro: Man Ji Lvcha Chuan Cheng Xiao Kelian
Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián

altTitles.en: Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

description.en:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
description.fr:
Lin Feilu est une actrice oscarisée. Faire la mignonne, médire, feindre l'innocence ou jouer les innocentes. Peu importe, elle n’est pas quelqu'un de bien. Elle meurt le jour de son 27e anniversaire en se jurant que si elle a une prochaine vie, elle serait une bonne personne. Elle se réincarne en une princesse de cinq ans de la grande dynastie Dalin. Sa mère, concubine impériale n'était pas favorisée parce son frère aîné souffrait d'une déficience mentale.
Lin Feilu, bien que déterminée à rester une bonne personne, va utiliser ses talents de manipulatrice pour retourner la situation de sa famille.

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Ore ga Tobacco wo Yamenai Riyuu

altTitles.ja: Ore ga Tabako wo Yamenai Riyuu

altTitles.en: The Reason Why I Won’t Quit Smoking

altTitles.ru: Причина, по которой я не бросаю курить

altTitles.ja: 俺がタバコをやめない理由

description.en: Two co-workers out on a smoke break when one of their cigarettes suddenly goes out.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: A Certain Swordsman's Journey Through Life

altTitles.ja: とある剣士の半生

altTitles.en: A Certain Swordsman's Journey Through Life

title.en: Hardcore Santa and the Spirit's Wail

altTitles.ja: ハードコアサンタと魂の慟哭

altTitles.ja-ro: Hardcore Santa to Tamashii no Doukoku

description.en:
The best way to teach green tea a lesson is to be more green tea than her!
The heroine Xia Yijing died of hatred and accidentally activated the green tea system, let's teach the scumbag men and women a lesson! !
description.fr:
L'expression « thé vert » est utilisée pour décrire une personne manipulatrice et calculatrice. 
La meilleure façon de donner une leçon au thé vert est d'être plus thé vert que lui !
L'héroïne Xia Yijing est morte à cause de sa soeur manipulatrice et en mourant a activé le système du "thé vert ». À l’aide du gardien du système Bai Geng, un lapin qui parle, Xia va pouvoir prendre sa revanche sur ceux qui lui ont fait du mal.

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちのふたりのお話

description.en: A dragon and a boy under the same life circumstances meet.

altTitles.ja: 大蛇に嫁いだ娘

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Married the Big Snake
The Girl Who Married The Great Snake

description.en: Miyo, a human girl dedicated as an offering to the snake, the lord of the mountain. Miyo was frightened in front of a large snake that had a big body and swallowed a fox, but her feelings gradually changed...

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

altTitles.ja: 弱虫ペダル

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

altTitles.zh: 薄情总裁的专属小奶包

altTitles.zh-ro: Bóqíng Zǒngcái De Zhuānshǔ Xiǎo Nǎi Bāo

altTitles.en: The Fickle President's Exclusive Cutie Pie

description.en:
My mom is the naive and sweet protagonist in a tragic romance novel. My mom is also the substitute lover who escaped from the overbearing President. And I? Well, I'm the five-year-old genius hacker.

Gu Chu, a brilliant hacker, finds herself reborn in a tragic romance novel as a five-year-old cutie. Her mother is the unfortunate heroine, her father is the blind-to-reality President, and they're surrounded by scheming relatives, a two-faced aunt, and various villainous women.

Determined to protect her mother, little Gu Chu stands tall and begins to fight back. What harm could a five-year-old possibly cause? She just wants to protect her mommy and maybe inherit her President daddy's billions along the way.

altTitles.en: To Be You, Even Just for a Day

altTitles.th: ชิงชีวิตพลิกลิขิตชะตา

altTitles.es: Quiero ser tú, solo por un día

altTitles.tr: Sadece Bir Günlüğüne Sen Olmak İstiyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn trở thành cô ấy, dù chỉ một ngày

altTitles.ja: 君の全てを奪いたい

altTitles.uk: Я хочу стати тобою хоча б на один день

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

altTitles.ja: Otokojyuku Gaiden Date Omito

description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.
Unexpected endings, mind-blowing stories, so-cute-you-could-die hotpot ingredients... You'll laugh everyday until you get abs!
description.zh: 反转的剧情，开脑洞的故事，超萌火锅食材花样作死，每天逗你笑出腹肌！

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
description.zh: （架空朝代）大陈年间，菁贵妃霞光中诞下双生龙凤胎。皇子生来眉间一颗朱砂痣，皇女天生六指 。祥瑞与不祥同时出现，令同胞双生的二人迎来截然不同的命运，被迫与至亲分离。天劫将至，自出生便相离的他们是否能重逢？彼此又以何种方式与天命相争？

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

title.en: Ore ga Ojou-sama Gakkou ni "Shomin Sample" Toshite Rachirareta Ken

altTitles.en: I was Kidnapped as "Commoner Sample" for an All-Girls School
Shomin Sample: I Was Abducted by an Elite All-Girls School as a Sample Commoner

altTitles.th: นายสามัญชนจอมกวน ป่วนหัวใจยัยคุณหนูไฮโซ

altTitles.ja: 俺がお嬢様学校に「庶民サンプル」として拉致られた件

altTitles.zh: 关于我被绑架到大小姐学校当「庶民样本」这件事

altTitles.ko: 내가 아가씨 학교에 "서민 샘플"로 납치 된 사건

description.en: In a hidden school surrounded by mountains, young ladies of good families are taught everything a high class lady needs to know. They are also completely cut off from the outside world, keeping them sheltered and innocent. However, a problem has come up recently– more and more graduates are failing to cope with the modern world after graduation. To deal with this problem, they've decided to kidnap a male commoner student, and enroll him as a student. They hope that this will be a gentle way to introduce the girls to the outside world. Kagurazaka Kimito is chosen for this dubious honor, mostly because he seems utterly average. However, the school leaders also seem to have concluded he's a homosexual with a muscle fetish. When Kimito hears that the alternative may be castration (to protect the girls' purity), he eagerly plays along with this misconception. Now he'll just have to survive the attention of many high class young ladies that are completely out of touch with the world.
description.pt-br: Em uma escola escondida, cercada por montanhas, jovens senhoras de boas famílias aprendem tudo o que uma mulher de alta classe precisa saber. Elas também são completamente isoladas do mundo exterior, mantendo-se protegidas e inocentes. No entanto, um problema surgiu recentemente: Mais e mais garotas não estão conseguindo lidar com o mundo moderno após a graduação. Para sanar com esse problema, foi decido sequestrar um garoto "plebeu", e registrá-lo como um estudante dessa escola com o objetivo de este ser um caminho mais "suave" de introduzir as meninas ao mundo exterior. Kagurazaka Kimito é escolhido para esta duvidosa honra.

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

title.en: Saikin Haitta Shiro Madoushi ga Party Crusher de, Ore no Isekai Boukensha Seikatsu ga Houkai ni Kiki na Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: 最近入った白魔導士がパーティークラッシャーで、俺の異世界冒険者生活が崩壊の危機な件について

altTitles.zh: 最近加入的白魔导士是队伍破坏者，给我的异世界冒险者生活带来了崩坏危机

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who Joined My Party Is a Party Crusher, So My Isekai Life Is at Risk of Collapsing Once Again

description.en: Toma was transported to another world due to an accident caused by a female circle crusher. So, he made friends in the new world and rebuilt his life as an adventurer. However, then, another girl joined his party... Will his life collapse once again because of another circle crusher who also exists in this new world!?
description.id: Toma tertransmigrasi ke dunia lain akibat kecelakaan yang disebabkan oleh seorang perempuan perusak sirkel. Maka, ia membuat teman-teman di dunia baru tersebut dan membangun kembali hidupnya sebagai seorang petualang. Namun, kemudian, seorang gadis lain bergabung dalam timnya... Akankah hidupnya runtuh sekali lagi karena perusak sirkel lain yang juga ada di dunia baru ini!?
description.ja: サークルクラッシャー女子の騒動に巻き込まれて死になぜか異世界に転移したソーマは冒険者として第二の人生を歩んでいた。そんな彼の前にサークルクラッシャーならぬパーティクラッシャーが現れた――!!

description.en:
This is a relaxing comedy manhua with cute penguins as the MCs. Some of them are shy, some are loveable, some are mischievous... But they all have short arms and legs with no waist. Even though it's not easy living in the Antarctic with its cold weather and slippery floors, they make do by catching fish, playing, and waiting for their happiness. 

"I'm very terrified, but if I love you enough, I'll find the courage to confess. If I can't get your response the first time, then I'll try a hundred times, a thousand times, even ten thousand times."

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!

title.en: Quick Transmigration: The Host Wants To Die

altTitles.zh-ro: Kuai Chuan: Suzhu Ta Yixin Qiu Si

altTitles.vi: Xuyên Nhanh: Ký Chủ, Cô Ấy Một Lòng Muốn Chết

altTitles.ja: 今世も死を望みます

description.en: Troubled girl Ruan Xiaoli inexplicably binds herself to something claiming to be a system. It says, 'I’ll take you to three thousand worlds to be a villain, destroying the heavens and the earth, and stirring up blood and chaos.' Ruan Xiaoli finds this quite interesting and agrees. However… Hey, system, didn’t we agree that I’d just be a villain? Destroying the heavens and the earth and then getting killed by the world’s male lead should be enough. Why is it that every world’s male lead, instead of just killing me, seems to fall for this big villain? Hey, you, male lead, why are you following me around doing bad deeds? And you, am I the villain or are you? Ruan Xiaoli: I just want to be a proper villain and then be killed, achieving fame and success. I don’t want to fall in love; I just want to be killed by the world’s male lead. I’m wholeheartedly seeking death!

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?

altTitles.zh: 说谎的小狗会被吃掉的

description.en: The puppy is clearly an omnivore, then why does he have to pretend to be a carnivore? On his first day transferring into a new school, his secret was discovered by his fox classmate. Then begins his life of living under “threat”, but after spending more time with him, the fox isn’t actually too awful…?
